summary: Dark mode workout tracking app with black and red color scheme, weight progress tracking, custom workout creation, exercise filtering by equipment type and muscle group, and full CRUD operations for exercises in the library

existing_features.title: Implement dark mode UI theme throughout the entire application with appropriate dark backgrounds, light text, and sufficient contrast for readability

Create exercise library page with filtering UI that allows users to filter by equipment type (dropdown with: Dumbbell, Barbell, Free Weight, Machine, Plate-Loaded Machine, Cable) and muscle group (dropdown with: back, chest, biceps, triceps, shoulders, core, lower body), displaying filtered results alphabetically
Create workout creation/editing page that allows users to name a workout, search and add exercises to it, and save the complete workout
Create weight logging interface where users can select an exercise, enter weight, reps, and sets, and log the entry with current date/time
Create weight progress view that displays historical weight entries for a selected exercise, showing date, weight, reps, and sets in chronological order with visual indication of progress trends
Create workouts list page that displays all saved workouts with ability to view workout details (exercises included) and start a workout session
Add edit button to each ExerciseCard component that opens an edit form pre-populated with the exercise's current name, equipment type, and muscle group
Implement exercise edit form with name input and dropdowns for equipment type and muscle group, with save functionality that calls the backend update method and refreshes the exercise list
Add delete button to each ExerciseCard component with confirmation dialog to prevent accidental deletion
Implement delete functionality that calls backend deleteExercise method and removes the exercise from the list with success feedback
Add 'Add New Exercise' button to the Exercise Library page that opens a form to create a new exercise with name input and dropdowns for equipment type and muscle group
Implement new exercise creation form that validates input and calls backend addExercise method, then refreshes the exercise list and shows success feedback
Update equipment type filter dropdown on Exercise Library page to include the new cardio equipment options: Treadmill, Assault Bike, Bike, Stairmaster
Update muscle group filter dropdown on Exercise Library page to include 'Full Body' option

Update the dark mode color palette in frontend/index.css to use a black and red color scheme, replacing the current OKLCH color variables with black backgrounds and red accent colors for primary elements, buttons, and interactive components

Update the Tailwind CSS configuration in frontend/tailwind.config.js to reflect the black and red color scheme, ensuring all custom theme colors use appropriate black and red values that integrate with the updated CSS variables

new_feature_requests.summary: Dark mode UI design
Track weight progress over time
Create custom workouts
Filter exercises by equipment type (Dumbbell, Barbell, Free Weight, Machine, Plate-Loaded Machine, Cable)
Filter exercises by muscle group (back, chest, biceps, triceps, shoulders, core, lower body)
Organize exercises alphabetically

Create backend data model for Exercise with fields: name (Text), equipmentType (Text: Dumbbell, Barbell, Free Weight, Machine, Plate-Loaded Machine, Cable), muscleGroup (Text: back, chest, biceps, triceps, shoulders, core, lower body)
Create backend data model for Workout with fields: name (Text), exerciseIds (array of exercise references), createdAt (timestamp)
Create backend data model for WeightEntry with fields: exerciseId (reference to exercise), weight (Nat), reps (Nat), sets (Nat), date (timestamp), workoutId (optional reference to workout)
Implement backend methods to create, read, update, and delete exercises with validation for equipment type and muscle group values
Implement backend methods to create, read, update, and delete workouts
Implement backend methods to log weight entries and retrieve weight progress history for a given exercise, sorted by date
Implement backend query method to filter exercises by equipment type, returning exercises that match the specified equipment type
Implement backend query method to filter exercises by muscle group, returning exercises that target the specified muscle group
Implement backend query method to return all exercises sorted alphabetically by name
Seed the backend with a comprehensive starter exercise database including common exercises across all equipment types and muscle groups
Create UI for editing existing exercises in the exercise library
Create UI for adding new exercises to the exercise library
Create UI for deleting exercises from the exercise library
Add 'full body' to the muscle group options
Add cardio equipment types: Treadmill, Assault Bike, Bike, Stairmaster to equipment type options
Add 'Full Body' as a valid muscle group option to the backend validation alongside existing options (back, chest, biceps, triceps, shoulders, core, lower body)

Add cardio equipment types (Treadmill, Assault Bike, Bike, Stairmaster) to the backend equipment type validation alongside existing options (Dumbbell, Barbell, Free Weight, Machine, Plate-Loaded Machine, Cable)
Create backend method to delete an exercise by ID, removing it from the exercise library
Create backend method to update an existing exercise, allowing modification of name, equipment type, and muscle group with validation
Update dark mode UI theme to use black and red color scheme throughout the application
